hanzi-su-wiki:
務

Значения

Служить, исполнять обязанности

Мнемоника

Прилагать силы 力 для овладения палицей 夂 и пикой 矛, исполнять воинский долг.

Варианты

务
purpleculture_pinyin:
wù
affair; business; matter; to be engaged in; to attend to; by all means
Роман; бизнес; иметь значение; заниматься; уделить внимание; во всех смыслах

heisig_chinese_memo: It is with the halberd he holds that the taskmaster exerts his power over those actually performing the tasks.
heisig_constituent: task, halberd, beforehand, taskmaster, power, muscle, arnold
koohiiStory1: It is with the halberd he holds that the taskmaster exerts his power over those actually performing the task.
koohiiStory2: So many video games have a "boss" stage you must pass in order to advance to the next level. Here, your task is to use your halberd to beat the taskmaster with the huge, bulging muscles.
jp_example_words:
業務(ぎょうむ): business, affairs, duties, work
勤務(きんむ): service, duty, work
公務(こうむ): official business, public business
職務(しょくむ): professional duties
庶務(しょむ): general affairs
税務署(ぜいむしょ): tax office
責務(せきむ): duty, obligation
務める(つとめる): to serve, to fill a post, to serve under, to exert oneself, to endeavor, to be diligent, to play (the part of), to work (for)
任務(にんむ): duty, function, office, mission, task
義務(ぎむ): duty, obligation, responsibility
事務(じむ): business, office work
務め(つとめ): service, duty, business, responsibility, task
公務員(こうむいん): public servant
事務所(じむしょ): office
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use a special spear in winter to give yourself the power to do all of your tasks.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It's hard to get a task done in winter. That's why you have this spear to power and motivate you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your task is to spear this cow. "Moo (む)!" it yells at you and runs away. You need to make dinner though... that's your task, so you better catch up to that cow and put an end to its mooing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The moo haunts you as you finish your task. Luckily this spear is helping you keep going even though this task is really difficult.
Ru_trainchinese:
wù: (нареч) обязательно, непременно
wù: (графема) дело, работа; делать, заниматься
Kanshudo_mnemonic: making an effort (力) to strike (攵) with a halberd (矛) is work
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: With those muscly walking legs you have the power to do any tasks.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Service " inscriptions as " Wu " on the left margin from " ◎ from" Down " person " from the right " Po " in the left margin Elephant Man wearing a helmet (pocket iron pot) in the shape, for protective helmets invasion, so On the right side, the meaning of " Zao " will strike (see Zhang Shichao), after the sound of " ◎ " becomes " Spear ", and " Spear " is the sound symbol of " Scrap ".

The inscription " stun " is pronounced as " insult ", which means bullying. Mao Gongding: "I'm a widow and widow." They read as " service ," which means dedication, Zhongshan Wang Fang pot: "ancient deities Wu (service) before (at) Yin too, namely that (times) was the people."

"Shuowen": "Worry, fun. Conquer the sound."
humanum_short_description_en: " Service " inscriptions as " Wu " on the left margin from " ◎ from" Down " person " from the right " Po " in the left margin Elephant Man wearing a helmet (pocket iron pot) in the shape, for protective helmets invasion, so On the right, the meaning of " sweeping " will strike (see Zhang Shichao), after " ◎ " is turned into " spear ", " spear " is the sound symbol of " stun ".
humanum_full_description:
「務」金文作「敄」，左旁上從「◎」下從「人」，右從「攴」，左旁象人戴頭盔(兜鍪)之形，頭盔用作防護侵襲，故右旁從「攴」會打擊之意(參張世超)，「◎」後聲化為「矛」，「矛」是「敄」的聲符。

　　金文「敄」通讀作「侮」，表示欺侮。毛公鼎：「廼敄(侮)鰥寡」。又通讀作「務」，表示致力，中山王方壺：「古之聖王敄(務)才(在)得賢，其即(次)得民」。

　　《說文》：「務，趣也。从力敄聲。」
humanum_short_description: 「務」金文作「敄」，左旁上從「◎」下從「人」，右從「攴」，左旁象人戴頭盔(兜鍪)之形，頭盔用作防護侵襲，故右旁從「攴」會打擊之意(參張世超)，「◎」後聲化為「矛」，「矛」是「敄」的聲符。

①事情：事務。任務。公務。特務。不識時務(不認識時代潮流和當前形勢)。
②從事，致力：務工。務實(從事或討論具體的工作)。務虛。當務之急。
③追求：好(hào)高務遠。
④必須，一定：務必。務須。除惡務盡。
⑤舊時收稅的關卡(現多用於地名)：曹家務(在中國河北省)。
⑥姓氏。

「 務 」金文作「 敄 」，左旁上從「 ◎ 」下從「 人 」，右從「 攴 」，左旁象人戴頭盔(兜鍪)之形，頭盔用作防護侵襲，故右旁從「 攴 」會打擊之意(參張世超)，「 ◎ 」後聲化為「 矛 」，「 矛 」是「 敄 」的聲符。 金文「 敄 」通讀作「 侮 」，表示欺侮。毛公鼎：「廼敄(侮)鰥寡」。又通讀作「 務 」，表示致力，中山王方壺：「古之聖王敄(務)才(在)得賢，其即(次)得民」。 《說文》：「務，趣也。从力敄聲。」
" Service" inscriptions as " Wu" on the left margin from " ◎ from" Down " person" from the right " Po" in the left margin Elephant Man wearing a helmet (pocket iron pot) in the shape, for protective helmets invasion, so On the right side, the meaning of " Zao" will strike (see Zhang Shichao), after the sound of " ◎" becomes " Spear", and " Spear" is the sound symbol of " Scrap". The inscription " stun" is pronounced as " insult", which means bullying. Mao Gongding: "I'm a widow and widow." They read as " service," which means dedication, Zhongshan Wang Fang pot: "ancient deities Wu (service) before (at) Yin too, namely that (times) was the people." "Shuowen": "Worry, fun. Conquer the sound."

務字的基本解释

務
wù
见“务”。

務字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》亡遇切，去遇，微。］
“务1”的繁体字。
(1)从事；致力。
(2)操劳。
(3)事业；工作。
(4)必须；一定。
(5)宋代管理贸易及税收的机关。
(6)宋元俗语，酒店亦称“務”。
(7)姓。夏时有務光。
[②]［wǔ］
［《集韻》罔甫切，上噳，微。］
通“侮1”。“务2”的繁体字。
[③]［mào］
［《集韻》莫切，去，明。］
“务3”的繁体字。
(1)通“瞀”。眩惑。
(2)通“冒”。《荀子·哀公》：“古之王者有務而拘領者矣，其政好生而惡殺焉。”杨倞注：“《尚書大傳》曰：'古之人衣上有冒而句領者。'鄭康成注云：'……冒，覆項也。'”一说，務通“鍪”。梁启雄释：“務讀爲'鍪'，《淮南子·氾論》：'古者有鍪而綣領以王天下者矣，其德生而不殺。'正作'鍪'字。”

務字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　務； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页148第20
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?亡遇切，音霧。【說文】趣也。从力，敄聲。【徐曰】言趣赴此事也。【爾雅·釋詁】務，彊也。【註】事務以力勉彊。【廣韻】事務也，專力也。【易·繫辭】夫易開物成務。又姓。【廣韻】列仙傳有務光。又【集韻】微夫切，霧平聲。務婁，邑名。又【廣韻】謨袍切，音毛。前高後下。又【集韻】莫?切，音茂。昏也。又【正韻】罔古切，音武。同侮。【詩·小雅】兄弟鬩于牆，外禦其務。又【韻補】叶迷侯切，音謀。【劉楨·瓜賦】豐細異形，圓方殊務。揚暉發藻，九采雜糅。糅平聲。

務字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" death meets cutting, going to meet, micro. ]
Traditional characters of "务1".
(1) To engage in; to work hard.
(2) Work hard.
(3) Career; work.
(4) Must; Definitely.
(5) The organs that administer trade and taxation in the Song Dynasty.
(6) As the saying of Song and Yuan dynasties, the hotel is also called "wu".
(7) Last name. In summer time there is business light.
[②]［wǔ］
["Jiyun" cut, up and down, micro. ]
Pass "Insult 1". Traditional characters of "务2".
[③]［mào］
["Ji Yun" Do not cut, go, Ming. ]
Traditional characters of "务3".
(1) Through "瞀". Dizzy.
(2) To pass "fake". "Xunzi·Aigong": "The king of the ancients has duties but the one who holds the leader is not allowed, and his government is good, but he kills him." Yang Diao's note: "The "Shangshu Dazhuan" said: "The ancients have a collar on their clothes. "Zheng Kangcheng's note: "... Take a risk, cover the item."" One said, Wutong "Xiao". Liang Qixiong explained: "Wu is read as'鍪', "Huainanzi Panlun":'The ancients had 鍪, but the scorpion led the world to the king, and his virtue survives but does not kill. The character'zheng' is used for'鍪'."

wù
вм. 务
Radicals: 矛, 夂, 力  (spear, winter, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use a special spear in winter to give yourself the power to do all of your tasks.
It's hard to get a task done in winter. That's why you have this spear to power and motivate you.
Reading Mnemonic
Your task is to spear this cow. "Moo (む)!" it yells at you and runs away. You need to make dinner though... that's your task, so you better catch up to that cow and put an end to its mooing.
The moo haunts you as you finish your task. Luckily this spear is helping you keep going even though this task is really difficult.
